sentences.en: He was stricken at twenty-one with a crippling malady.
sentences.cn: 二十一岁时腿瘸疾病让他受到重击。

sentences.en: Kiss me once again, and go to thy trifles and amusements; for my malady distresseth me.
sentences.cn: 再吻我一次，投入你的琐事和娱乐中吧；我的病使我痛苦。

sentences.en: He stopped, blushed, then continued low and sadly, "Ah, my malady persecuteth me again, and my mind wandereth."
sentences.cn: 他停了下来，涨红了脸，然后继续低沉而悲伤地说：“啊，我的病又来折磨我了，我精神错乱了。”
